item.title: Back-to-Back Auto Accidents in Gadwal: Workersâ€™ Safety at Risk
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A series of road accidents involving overloaded autos and Boleros continues to endanger workers' lives in the district. Just a day after an auto accident in Jammichedu, another similar mishap took place near Kishtapuram village in Aija Mandal on Tuesday.
In the latest incident, a passenger auto carrying laborers overturned, leaving several injured. Among them, three suffered serious injuries, while eight others sustained minor wounds. The injured were immediately rushed to Gadwal Distri...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
